page.title: 06CHILDS LEISURE ABBEY WOOD
page.content:
My leisure interests are canoing,caving and swimming. I go canoing every week. We go over Thamesmead. I like canoing because you can capsize and have raft races. A raft race is when you link the canoes together and run across them without falling in. Caving is hard. You have to get through small holes. I went in a wet cave. A wet cave is when all water goes through the caves. I like caving because it is hard. I saw a bat and it flew away. I go swimming every week. I have done my 10 meters right up to my silver. I am hoping to join a swimming club so I can do my gold and honours. I hope that I will do them.
MARC INWOOD AGE 10
